thread.title: PSG's Thomas Meunier is a Manchester United fan | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: PSG's Thomas Meunier is a Manchester United fan | Daily Mail Online

author: Matthew Smith For Mailonline
title: PSG's Thomas Meunier is a Manchester United fan | Daily Mail Online
text: Clubs: RE Virton, Club Brugge, PSG Club games: 227; Goals: 22 Honours: 2015/16 Jupiler League; 2015 Belgian Cup International caps: 15; Goals: 1 Meunier told DH: ‘I’ve always said that one day, I would like to play in the Premier League. ‘I’m very happy in Paris and if I finish my career there, it won’t be a disappointment, far from it. But, if one day, I had to leave Paris, why not? ‘On the other side of the channel, there are the stadiums, the fans, and I’ve never hidden that I’m a big fan of Manchester United, which remains, in my eyes, the real reference in the world of football.’ While Meunier may be dreaming of joining United, his current side are doing what those in the red half of Manchester can only dream of - running riot in the Champions League. PSG all but booked their place in the quarter-finals on Tuesday night with a stunning 4-0 victory over Barcelona. Meunier played the full 90 minutes as Angel Di Maria - whose own time at Manchester United was less dream than nightmare - inspired a famous night at Parc des Princes. Angel Di Maria, who endured a torrid spell at United, scored twice as PSG beat Barcelona 4-0 Meunier played the full 90 minutes of a famous win for the hosts at the Parc des Princes RELATED ARTICLES
